channel.title: [Help with status page]
channel.description:
Hello,
So, I had my server on the status 1st page with 1.7k votes, it was showing up as online all the time until today. The uptime went down to 96% and it showed up as offline, but the server actually is online. So I investigated the IP's/ports and all that stuff, it's online. R-L shows that it's online too.
This is the link to it : http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=vyrescapepk.no-ip.biz
What should I do?
P.S Sorry for double posting.
EDIT: Can I somehow change the status pages IP adress?

item.title: [Help with status page]
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

Hello,

So, I had my server on the status 1st page with 1.7k votes, it was showing up as online all the time until today.

So I investigated the IP’s/ports and all that stuff, it’s online. R-L shows that it’s online too.
